content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at (-14, -15)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (24.0, -15.0)
- Storage chest at (23.5, -16.5)
Mining coal with current storage of 318 coal

### Iron Ore Mining Station at (-14, 23)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-14.0, 23.0)
- Storage chest at (-14.5, 21.5)
Mining iron ore with current storage of 271 iron ore

### Iron Smelting Station at (-10, 20)
Consists of:
- Two stone furnaces at (-11.0, 20.0) and (-9.0, 20.0)
Currently idle due to lack of ingredients

### Copper Processing Complex at (22, 20)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (20.0, 20.0) with output chest at (20.5, 21.5)
- Stone furnace at (24.0, 20.0)
- Input inserter at (22.5, 20.5) moving ore from chest (22.5, 21.5) to furnace
- Output inserter at (24.5, 18.5) moving plates from furnace to storage chest (24.5, 17.5)
- Multiple storage chests:
  - Copper ore storage at (22.5, 21.5) containing 385 ore
  - Copper plate storage at (24.5, 17.5) containing 53 plates

ERROR TIPS

### Entity Placement Conflicts
- Before placing new inserters, check if the position is already occupied by another entity
- When placing entities next to existing structures, ensure proper spacing and direction parameters to avoid conflicts with existing entities

### Furnace Operation Issues
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" warning - ensure proper connection between input inserters and material supply
- Monitor fuel levels in furnaces - some are showing "furnace fuel source is full" warning
